ygData.msgSnippet: (Yeah, risking moderation and all that good stuff, but hey, I participate so little you could moderate me for a year and it wouldn t matter :)  Seriously,

(Yeah, risking moderation and all that good stuff, but hey, I participate so 
little you could moderate me for a year and it wouldn't matter :)  Seriously, 
should the whole be punished for the actions for one jerk who doesn't let 
crap go, that being Dewboy?  This reminds me of my physical education class.  
The teacher punishes the whole because a couple losers decide to walk instead 
of jog or not do a couple push ups.  

And while I enjoy this extra exercise, it gets to the point where because of 
these slackers I'm working extremely hard and I can't go on.  Now, the 
relevance to this situation is once again; Why the hell are you punishing the 
rest of us just because of Dewboy's constant attacks on LN?)

Well, that's my rant, Later

-Teufel (It be a new name, Unitron was gay and unoriginal.  Yeah, it'll take 
a minute for the shock to wear off, but Unitron was a rip off of Unicron! 
*gasps fill the air)
